page.title: 07DAILY VISITORS TO HOMES.
page.content: At 8.30a.m.the{MILKMAN}comes from the dairy in Leamington in his float.He puts fresh pint bottles of milk on the doorstep and takes the empties away.He also delivers yoghurt,cream,bread and potatoes.He collects the money on Friday evening.The{POSTMAN}comes in his red van from Leamington sorting office at 7.30a.m.He carries his sack from house to house putting the right letters in the right letterboxes.He also empties the postbox and collects any parcels from the post office.He also delivers parcels.The{PAPERBOY }or girl collects the newspapers and magazines from the newsagents at 7.am. Travelling on his bicycle he delivers them to the houses where they have been ordered.He is a schoolboy who likes earning extra money there are 6 delivering to 450 houses in Hampton Magna in morning,5 in evening.
